play:PlayType.play:title: A Midsummer Night's Dream

play:fm.play:p: Text placed in the public domain by Moby Lexical Tools, 1992.
Altered slightly by Bryan Dollery, 2003, for inclusion in an article on XML parsing in Java. Published in DevX (www.devx.com) in February 2003
This work may be freely copied and distributed worldwide.

play:PlayType.play:sceneDescription: SCENE Athens, and a wood near it.

play:scene.title: SCENE I. Athens. The palace of THESEUS.
play:scene.play:stageDirections: Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, PHILOSTRATE, and Attendants

play:speech.play:speaker: THESEUS
play:speech.play:line: Now, fair Hippolyta, our nuptial hour
